hero.core_tension: Decision tension between concentrating a two-week pre-Thanksgiving full‑price activation to capture high willingness-to-pay and preserving margin vs defaulting to broad deep discounts later; depict the moment of committing to a focused window that narrows downstream choices.
hero.setting: Flagship storefront prep area — storefront glass, matte wood display plinths, linen swatches, and a studio lighting grid in the background.
hero.persona: Store operations lead and studio creative director collaborating, sleeves rolled, hands poised over product mockups.
hero.action: Close three-quarter shot of hands aligning an exclusive product box on a plinth while a second hand smooths a loyalty cohort tag into place; the studio lead adjusts a soft key light with the other hand.
hero.urgency_symbol: Symbolic narrowing: converging bands of light and a taut satin ribbon pulled between two hands to suggest a shrinking high-value window without a timepiece.
props: fabric swatches and brass sample weights
studio light gobo partially casting a slit of highlight
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, one directional soft key, high-contrast negative space to emphasize the aligned objects.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, decisive — poised momentum before launch.
hero.alt: Three-quarter close-up of a store ops lead and a studio creative director collaborating over a flagship display: hands place a limited-run product box and a paper loyalty tag onto a matte wood plinth. Polished editorial light creates a narrow band of bright highlight and deep clean negative space; a taut satin ribbon between hands visually narrows the scene to imply a concentrated launch window.

signal_map.structure: Layered concentric arcs and intersecting radial paths on semi-translucent vellum overlays pinned to a wooden table (rings represent campaign windows: inner = high-value window, middle = event cluster, outer = staged calendar).
elements: paper tokens for cohorts and drops
folded map overlays marking flagship nodes
tactile paths cut from matte card stock
signal_map.motion: Subtle implied flow: pins and tokens suggest pulses toward the inner arc (concentration), a lateral sweep at one arc for cultural clustering, and staggered token stacks for staged markdown cadence.
signal_map.palette: Warm neutrals (cream, taupe), matte black paths, brass highlights, and soft studio-gray vellum to emphasize material tactility.
signal_map.alt: Overhead image of a physical signal map: concentric vellum arcs pinned with brass tacks and paper tokens. Hands—one from an operator, one from a studio art director—arrange tokens toward the innermost arc while light casts confident highlights and clean shadows, implying focused flow toward a concentrated campaign window.

case_studies.scene: In-store staging table at a flagship near a busy avenue, with modular fixtures and a rolling merch cart in frame.
case_studies.moment: Final pre-launch alignment for a two-week pre-Thanksgiving activation: operator places exclusive SKU on a curated plinth as studio adjusts the light pattern.
case_studies.persona: Field operations manager and retail creative producer working side-by-side.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial — warm key from above, crisp rim highlight, generous negative space to isolate the action.
case_studies.mood: Intent, economical, performance-focused — capturing early full-price demand.
case_studies.alt: Side-angle image of a staging table where a field ops manager sets a limited product box on a curated plinth while a retail creative producer tweaks a clamp light. The scene uses warm editorial lighting and clean negative space to emphasize focused pre-Thanksgiving preparation.

case_studies.scene: Street-level pop-up install adjacent to a parade route with city pavement, scaffolding, and a branded awning partially in frame.
case_studies.moment: Last-minute co-branded fixture install timed to peak foot-traffic clustering; two people test the sightlines and handshake on placement.
case_studies.persona: Brand partnerships manager and field ops coordinator coordinating with a studio installer.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial with confident highlights on materials and deep clean negative space to separate foreground and city background.
case_studies.mood: Dynamic, opportunistic, collaborative — monetizing cultural clustering without friction.
case_studies.alt: Low-angle view of a street pop-up install near a parade route: a brand partnerships manager and a field ops coordinator secure a modular panel while a studio installer holds a rolled banner. Editorial highlights pick out the fabric texture and brass fastenings; the surrounding negative space keeps focus on the coordinated handoff.

case_studies.scene: Planning studio table with physical inventory cubes, bundle mockups, and a ledger of phased markdown tiers laid out across textured paper.
case_studies.moment: Merchandise and analytics leads place stacked inventory tokens to visualize a staged holiday calendar: loyalty-only early savings, curated partner bundles mid-period, reserved deep markdowns at inflection points.
case_studies.persona: Merch planner and analytics lead aligning physical tokens to model margin-sensitive discounting.
props: bundle mockups with textured paper wraps
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial — soft directional light, crisp highlights on material edges, pronounced negative space to foreground the token shifts.
case_studies.mood: Analytic, measured, controlled — rethinking discount math to preserve margin elasticity.
case_studies.alt: Overhead three-quarter shot of a planning studio table: a merch planner and analytics lead place wooden inventory cubes and bundle mockups on labeled ledger cards. Soft editorial lighting produces confident highlights on the cubes' edges and deep negative space, visually conveying deliberate staging of a holiday calendar for margin management.
